alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, southeastern Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 202 PM EDT/102 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Panama City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Wewahitchka, St Andrews State Park, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Bayou George, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach and Brannonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for the Panhandle of Florida.
